topicTitle: Why I havent been on any nnjg servers lately

posts.postText: I have been working on a mod that i plan to release for minecraft on monday, it will contain carpets of all colors. maybe 2 weeks after that i plan on making a smp plugin for it but only if u want it on ur server. I'll post some pictures of it today when i'm done with it to show you. oh and it uses modloader and should be compatible with any mod unless they use the same block ids. and kryzoid ill be on today to pay for my hotel.

http://s1209.photobucket.com/albums/cc397/Fusiondragon145/  here are the pictures of the finished product gonna post it soon but im still gonna add more stuff like turning colored wool into its dye so u can use it towards your carpet(added), pressure plate carpet and glowstone carpet(added), and colored stairs and slabs(added).
here's to hoping it isn't another extremely obvious .exe file with a keylogger in it, like Gavin tried to pull.
-.- im pretty sure if i was do to something like that i wouldnt be posting pictures to show what it looks like, plus im releasing it onto the mcforums right now so u can check it out urself.
The single player mod is up for those who would like to use it  http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/565335-173fusions-carpet-mod-v10/page__gopid__7464697#entry7464697
thank you tin for the nice comment and support unlike someone

>> thank you tin for the nice comment and support unlike someone 
lol pirate.
